name: Manual Maintenance Operations
description: Manual triggers for bulk operations and quality assurance

triggers.name: Generate Documentation
triggers.description: Bulk generate or update documentation across the repository
triggers.message:
Running bulk documentation generation. I will:
1. Scan all Bicep templates and ensure they have proper README files
2. Check all PowerShell scripts for documentation compliance
3. Validate parameter documentation matches actual template parameters
4. Generate missing parameter files for Bicep templates
5. Update folder-level README files for navigation
6. Provide a summary of what was updated or needs attention

triggers.name: Validate All Templates
triggers.description: Comprehensive validation of all Bicep templates and scripts
triggers.message:
Running comprehensive template validation. I will:
1. Validate syntax of all Bicep templates using az deployment validate
2. Check PowerShell scripts for syntax errors and best practices
3. Verify all parameter files are valid JSON and match templates
4. Test all internal links in README files
5. Check for security issues (hardcoded secrets, etc.)
6. Provide detailed validation report with any issues found

triggers.name: Update Blog Mappings
triggers.description: Review and update BLOG-TO-CODE-MAPPING.md with new content
triggers.message:
Updating BLOG-TO-CODE-MAPPING.md. I will:
1. Scan repository for new implementations not yet mapped
2. Suggest blog articles from technicalanxiety.com that relate to new content
3. Identify existing implementations that could be better connected
4. Recommend new sections or categories for the mapping
5. Check for broken links to blog articles
6. Suggest improvements to existing mapping entries

triggers.name: Repository Health Check
triggers.description: Comprehensive repository quality and organization review
triggers.message:
Running repository health check. I will:
1. Review folder organization and suggest improvements
2. Identify outdated content that should be archived
3. Check version consistency across related templates
4. Validate all cross-references and related resource links
5. Review security practices across all implementations
6. Suggest opportunities for new content based on gaps
7. Provide recommendations for repository optimization
